application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description:
Approval of Details Pursuant of Condition  (3 & 4  )  of Planning permission reference P2023/1705/FUL, dated 22/09/2023
Remodelling of single-storey rear extension at upper ground floor level rear; installation of dormer window to the rear roofslope and installation of a replacement window to the front roofsclope; installation of replacement window within the front lightwell; and installation of solar panels at roof level.. (Listed building consent also submitted ref: P2023/1743)
decision_conditions: This consent relates solely to listed building matters. Should it become necessary to make alterations to the consented scheme in order to comply with other legislation, such as Building Regulations, a further consent may be required. Such a consent should be sought and obtained prior to the relevant works being undertaken.
